moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.effect: Never misses during a hailstorm. Has a very small chance of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: Brace Yourself!
moves.effect: The lower the user’s HP is, the more this move raises the user’s Defense. Makes the user gradually heal itself.

syncMove.name: Freezing Terror Blizzard
syncMove.description: Its power increases if the target is frozen.

passives.name: Hostile Environment 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.
